com.netflix.genie.web.spring.autoconfigure.agent.apis.rpc.v4.endpoints

Class AgentRpcEndpointsAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.spring.autoconfigure.agent.apis.rpc.v4.endpoints.AgentRpcEndpointsAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class AgentRpcEndpointsAutoConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configures various gRPC services and related beans if gRPC functionality is enabled.
    Since:
    4.0.0

 @ConditionalOnMissingBean(value=com.netflix.genie.proto.FileStreamServiceGrpc.FileStreamServiceImplBase.class)
public GRpcAgentFileStreamServiceImpl gRpcAgentFileStreamService(JobDirectoryManifestProtoConverter converter,
                                                                                                                                                                                       @Qualifier(value="genieTaskScheduler")

        converter - The JobDirectoryManifestProtoConverter instance to use
